Text.Value: What's this then - trying to creep around us and loot the crypt? Not happening.

EditorData.NodeContext: Suspicious

Text.Value: I think that ship's an invasion force. Run while you can!
First you look, then you touch, then you take!

EditorData.NodeContext: He's not happy with the player saying they're just looking around, and he's going to attack soon.

Text.Value: That ship's full of poisonous vapours. Probably demonic. I'd stay away.
That ship is full of monsters. I wouldn't go near it.
Well, uh, in that case...

EditorData.NodeContext: We scared the gnome off from attacking us or investigating the crashed ship, though he doesn't really want to show it too much.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Alerted by Warryn, Gimblebock hurries up to confront the player
EditorData.logicalname: Cinematic - Gimblebock runs up to player

Text.Value: The only thing you own is your life. Leave before I take that, too.
Or is it the ship you're after? Don't matter either way - it's ours, all of it.

EditorData.NodeContext: Threatening

Text.Value: ... we're, uh... we're leaving! C'mon, move it!

EditorData.NodeContext: He's intimidated/scared and his subordunate just told him she doesn't want to fight, so he's backing out of the fight.

Text.Value: You're all hot air - think you can get us to leave that bounty to you? Not a chance!

EditorData.NodeContext: Looking down on the player (figuratively, not literally) - we tried to scare him away, but he won't be intimidated. He's going to attack soon.

Text.Value: Take your best shot - you'll only get one.
Just grin, baring your fangs.
Oh yeah? Well we're... we're -

EditorData.NodeContext: The player just taunted him, and he's trying to retort, but he's very intimidated.

Text.Value: That is my kin's prize, not yours.
I ain't fighting him. Not a chance.
I ain't fighting her. Not a chance.
I ain't fighting them. Not a chance.

EditorData.NodeContext: Decides that the player isn't someone to mess with; tells his/her superior in no uncertain terms that they don't have his back if a fight breaks out.

Text.Value: Don't like the sound of this, boss...

EditorData.NodeContext: His/her fears are validated - they should clear off rather than court danger.

Text.Value: I mean no harm - I'm just looking around.
MINE.
Wrong. Walk. Now.
The only thing we're sharing with you is our pointy ends - get 'im!
The only thing we're sharing with you is our pointy ends - get 'er!
The only thing we're sharing with you is our pointy ends - get 'em!

EditorData.NodeContext: He's going to attack the player, who just said they were just looking around.

Text.Value: Nothing's yours but your life - and I can take that from you just as easily.
You! Not another step, hear me?

EditorData.NodeContext: Sharp ultimatum mixed with a little surprise. Found the player approaching from the side of the structure.

Text.Value: C'mon you lot, no point in gettin' killed. Second worm gets the cheese, an' all...

EditorData.NodeContext: He's still a little bit shaken from our intimidation, but tries to get over it, by proposing to wait the danger out.

Text.Value: Your loud words hide fear, confusion. Looting that ship will bring you no peace.
Poisonous wha...?

EditorData.NodeContext: surprised and a little scared - he was just told that the thing he was going to loot emits poisonous fumes.

Text.Value: Oh yeah? Well, I don't see any of your kin here to claim it!

EditorData.NodeContext: Replying to a player saying the ship he wants is their kin's prize. He thinks he's got the upper hand.

Text.Value: Selfish cur - there might be survivors, yet you think only of loot. Leave before I make you leave.
Dead freak. Get 'im!
Dead freak. Get 'er!
Dead freak. Get 'em!

EditorData.NodeContext: hostile upon seeing someone of a species not common to this world

Text.Value: What're you lot waiting for? Get 'im!
What're you lot waiting for? Get 'er!
What're you lot waiting for? Get 'em!

EditorData.NodeContext: Ordering his underlings to kill the player.

Text.Value: Boss! Got company up here.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Hollering down to Gimblebock, his leader (down some steps behind Warryn, out of view).
EditorData.NodeContext: Hollering down to Gimblebock, his leader (down some steps behind Warryn, out of view)

Text.Value: What's wrong with his face? Freak.
What's wrong with her face? Freak.
What's wrong with their face? Freak.

EditorData.NodeContext: Unnerved and hostile upon seeing someone of a species not common to this world (a githyanki - yellow skin, black eyes, pointed ears and high, flat nose).

Text.Value: Attack.
Nobody's getting any damn cheese! Now move it!

EditorData.NodeContext: Annoyed because his underling corrected him on mixing up a metaphor. He isn't shouting too lood, because he just got intimidated and doesn't want to make too big of a scene.

Text.Value: Uh, second mouse gets the cheese, no?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Underling hesitantly chimes in, correcting the gnome's mixed metaphor.
EditorData.NodeContext: Hesitantly chiming in to correct the boss's mixed metaphor: 'the second worm gets the cheese'.

Synopsis: Alternate version of the confrontation scene between Gimblebock and his bandits at the crypt - triggers if the player approaches the scene from the side, alerting Warryn first.
